resources.string: • Click to move 1 card, face up, to Waste\n• When empty, click redeals all cards, face down, from Waste to Stock
• Click to move top card to valid pile in either Foundation or Tableau
• Build up by suit and rank, starting from Ace and ending at King\n• Click to move top card to valid pile in Tableau

• Build down by rank and alternating color\n• Any amount of cards can be moved as long as they are ranked correctly and alternating color\n• A King or pile starting with a King can be place on an empty spot
